title: Monday Post Show (10-10-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (10-10-22)
description:
Bobby shares details about the new Apple Airtag feature that will save you money. We got more into Lunchbox’s performance over the weekend in Vegas. We get stories from Abby on how they almost missed their flight because of Lunchbox. Bobby talks about a foreign movie he started last night and wasn’t expecting to like. Plus, assorted news we didn’t get to during the show.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
